code: import{AJAX_BEGIN,AJAX_END,AJAX_ERROR,AJAX_SUCCESS}from'../actions/actionTypes';function ajaxStatusReducer(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:0;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case AJAX_BEGIN:return state+1;case AJAX_END:return state-1;default:return state;}}function ajaxErrorReducer(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{hasError:false,error:'',message:'',status:null,path:''};let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case AJAX_ERROR:return Object.assign({},state,{hasError:true,error:action.error,message:action.message,status:action.status,path:action.path});case AJAX_SUCCESS:return Object.assign({},state,{hasError:false,error:'',message:'',status:null,path:''});default:return state;}}export{ajaxStatusReducer,ajaxErrorReducer};
